column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: storm surges. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .@prefix surge: <http://www.example.org/storm_surge/> .surge:StormSurge rdf:type owl:Class ;                 rdfs:comment "Class representing storm surges" .surge:Cyclone rdf:type owl:Class ;              rdfs:comment "Class representing cyclones causing surges" .surge:Location rdf:type owl:Class ;               rdfs:comment "Class representing location of surges" .surge:severity rdf:type owl:DatatypeProperty ;               rdfs:domain surge:StormSurge ;               rdfs:range xsd:string ;               rdfs:comment "The severity of the storm surge" .surge:causedBy rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;               rdfs:domain surge:StormSurge ;               rdfs:range surge:Cyclone ;               rdfs:comment "The cyclone that caused the storm surge" .surge:inLocation rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;                 rdfs:domain surge:StormSurge ;                 rdfs:range surge:Location ;                 rdfs:comment "The location of the storm surge" .surge:cycloneName rdf:type owl:DatatypeProperty ;                  rdfs:domain surge:Cyclone ;                  rdfs:range xsd:string ;                  rdfs:comment "The name of the cyclone" .surge:locationName rdf:type owl:DatatypeProperty ;                   rdfs:domain surge:Location ;                   rdfs:range xsd:string ;                   rdfs:comment "The name of the location" .```
